website_summaries.verdict: All the quality and efficiency of a professional bar muddler at a fraction of the cost.
pros: The smooth, rounded end is comfortable to hold
The grooves between the teeth are shallow and easy to clean
This muddler is perfect for crushing fruit, but the teeth are gentle enough to ground spices and herbs for cooking
Has the look and feel of a much more expensive muddler
cons: When fully submerged in water, some water may leak inside of the muddler
It's easy to shake the water out

customer_reviews.title: Classy Muddler to Give as a Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this muddler to place in a Brandy Old Fashioned gift basket to be auctioned off at our local humane society's biggest fundraiser of the year. Lots of classy people show up and they're not afraid to up their bids on a high quality basket. This Barvivo product is certain to impress this crowd. The packaging is very classy and eye catching. Mix your adult beverages like a professional! High quality material and arrived in perfect condition. Reasonably priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: MadcitySusie

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASH IT IN THE DISHWASHER
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it does the job of muddling things together in your cocktail. However, the ingredients still tend to get stuck on the bottom of the muddler. BUT I MUST WARN YOU: DO NOT WASH IT IN THE DISHWASHER!!!! I did this once and water got stuck inside the metal part and every time I would shake it or try to crush something, some water would leak out. Instead, I use my older one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barvivo Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a completely unique reason ... to mash up things like capers or cottage cheese ... rather than to muddle drinks. After having used it for this type of purpose, I can honestly report that the device works very well, indeed! I was able to mash things up without having to resort to using a blender for small quantities. It's easy to clean and saves me a lot of time and work. Based on this, I would presume it to work very well as a drink muddler. It's elegant and sits in the hand comfortably. I am completely satisfied with the Barvivos performance and am happy that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: mlcsw

customer_reviews.title: Muddling through Muddlers?  Here is the one you need!
customer_reviews.text: Never knew I needed a muddler. Then I decided to try my hand at mixology. The first thing you need in order to make a proper Old Fashioned is a good muddler, and this is the one. The balance is perfect, the style is perfect, the customer service is outstanding. They care a lot about your purchase and even sent me a Comprehensive Cocktail party Guide - which I found extremely useful. I highly recommend. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Up your cocktail game with this durable professional muddler
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to muddle orange peel and cherries to perfect my Wisconsin Old Fashions. Very durable, it feels very sturdy and ergonomic in your hand. Muddles perfectly to get that extra fresh flavor in your drinks. If you don't know what a muddler does it basically is like taking a maraschino cherry and cutting it into many little pieces, releasing more flavor in the process. Cleans very easily and looks very attractive next to my other barware. Also great for starting conversations when people ask what you are doing when making the a tasty Old Fashioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK!
customer_reviews.text: It just does not muddle vey well.....maybe the points are not deep enough. Use for Mojitos and it dos not muddle the mint as well as I can do with a fork! It will do ......
customer_reviews.author: The Lady Wurthington

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and well made
customer_reviews.text: This muddler is just what I was looking for. It fits great in the hand, looks smart and most importantly gets the job done. It's a quick easy cleanup and I've had no issues with washing and drying it. I had been using a small 4-inch pestle before this and it was a real pain. I primarily use this muddler in a rocks glass and it's a perfect fit, however in a full size pint glass it might be just a tad short. I would definitely buy from Barvivo again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Dinoi

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with what I have seen from Barvivo, a company which clearly wants to provide quality products as well as customer service. This is a great tool, nicely balanced and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Early

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler for your Old Fashioned
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that doesn’t require too much instructions: it’s a muddler.... I use it for muddling cocktails especially for Old Fashioned! It’s very sturdy and seem to last long!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Muddle away!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness of this product and it’s functionality. It handles with ease and does a good job. Easy to clean. Excellent product!!

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and pleasing to look at. It also muddles well.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy going transaction, fast shipping, excellent packaging. Gave them as gifts to waiters and waitresses working in a friend's restaurant and they all loved this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hector D. Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Impress your guests and your customers
customer_reviews.text: This thing just PULVERIZES my fruit and herbs. It makes muddling, an activity I usually find a chore, a breeze. I actually enjoy the process now. It's also made me more confident in the cocktails I mix at work. The sleek design also makes me feel a bit fancy.
customer_reviews.author: FreePhoenix

customer_reviews.title: A "must have" gadget
customer_reviews.text: This muddler has multi-uses. It perfectly muddles citrus for cocktails, and then some. I used it to crush fresh ginger to make a tea, and it worked better than the pestle that I usually use. I even used it to crush sliced, dried garlic into smaller pieces, but not granules (which is what a pestle does). I wonder where else I can use this tool?
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Love The Muddler!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things that make me wonder how I ever did without it! It's sturdy, attractive, washes up easily. It arrived pretty fast, securely packaged. I would definitely buy from this seller again! Very happy with my new Muddler! So far, I've made Old Fashioneds, Mojitos and Mint Juleps with it. Next, I might try it for herbs, spices and Cilantro for Pesto
customer_reviews.author: A. Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler

The product is so good, I don't mind a little extra care in washing it.

If you're just looking for a muddler, this one is for you; and if you're looking to give a muddler as a gift, this one is perfect!

product_meta.title: Professional Drink Muddler - Ideal Bartender Tool for Old Fashioned & Mojitos by BARVIVO - Muddle & Mix the Perfect Cocktail Right at Home Using This 8in. Stainless Steel Pestle w/Grooved Nylon Head
feature_bullets: IMPRESS YOUR FRIENDS WITH FLAVOR BURSTING COCKTAILS RIGHT AT HOME - Never before has it been this easy to impress your friends, not only will you be able to serve wonderful cocktails but youll also be able to present a new cool and unique bar equipment. Its a great ice breaker and makes an excellent and funny topic of conversation during cocktail parties. Beside impressing your friends this piece is also ideal as a personalized gift for Christmas, birthdays or any other occasion.

STOP SPENDING A FORTUNE ON COCKTAILS AT BARS - Using this muddler as a part of your bartending accessories means you already have one of the essentials for mixing the best possible drinks such as caipirinha, mojito and old fashioned. Muddling ingredients such as natural mint, lime, citrus fruit or sugar enhance the flavors of the drink regardless of which type of alcohol you use, vodka, martini, bacardi rum or whiskey. The drinks will taste as if it was made at a bar by real bartenders.

DONT BUY A MUDDLER ONLINE OR IN A STORE BEFORE READING THIS --> Other cheap muddlers made of low quality stainless steel (not rustproof), aluminum, copper, granite stone, plastic, acrylic or rubber doesn't offer the same durability as the BARVIVO muddler which is made of high quality rustproof stainless steel. Wooden muddlers made of hardwood like walnut wood or bamboo tends to leave unpleasant residue and aftertaste in your drink - You won't have to worry about any of that using this muddler!

WHY ONLY USE IT AS A DRINK MUDDLER WHEN YOU CAN USE IT FOR SO MUCH MORE - This muddle stick have a lot of alternative uses in the kitchen, use it as a masher when making guacamole, mashed potatoes or as a BBQ sauce mixer. Customers has even recommended using it for preparing herbs to spice meat, to make a special kombucha tea or even to crush their medicine pills. Regardless of what alternative use you choose its easily cleaned by hand in 30 seconds or less. (Clean under rising water.)
